titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison--THOMAS, a dark griff, aged about 27 years, 5 feet 7 inches high; says he belongs to Mr. McMullen, of Mobile, Ala. MALEY, a dark griffe, aged about 51 years, 4 feet 11 inches high; says she belongs to Mme. Fryer, of New Or-leans. SARAH, a griffe, aged about 29 years, 4 feet 10 inches high; says she belongs to Mr. Jolie, of New Orleans. KEZIAH, a dark griffe, aged about 55 years, cross eyed, is 5 feet 3 inches high; says she belongs to Mr. Pinta, of New Orleans. The owners will please comply with the law and take them away. J. WORRELL, Warden. New Orleans, December 4, 1851. d5 1aw3w
mods.note: Mr. McMullen; Mme. Fryer; Mr. Jolie; Mr. Pinta
Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
